00126 struct {
00127     int          facility;
00128     const char * str;
00129 } facility_strmap[] = {
00130     { LOG_KERN,     "kern"     },
00131     { LOG_USER,     "user"     },
00132     { LOG_MAIL,     "mail"     },
00133     { LOG_DAEMON,   "daemon"   },
00134     { LOG_AUTH,     "auth"     },
00135     { LOG_SYSLOG,   "syslog"   },
00136     { LOG_LPR,      "lptr"     },
00137     { LOG_NEWS,     "news"     },
00138     { LOG_UUCP,     "uucp"     },
00139     { LOG_CRON,     "cron"     },
00140     { LOG_AUTHPRIV, "authpriv" },
00141     { LOG_FTP,      "ftp"      },
00142     { LOG_LOCAL0,   "local0"   },
00143     { LOG_LOCAL1,   "local1"   },
00144     { LOG_LOCAL2,   "local2"   },
00145     { LOG_LOCAL3,   "local3"   },
00146     { LOG_LOCAL4,   "local4"   },
00147     { LOG_LOCAL5,   "local5"   },
00148     { LOG_LOCAL6,   "local6"   },
00149     { LOG_LOCAL7,   "local7"   },
00150     { -1,           NULL       }
00151 };

00153 struct {
00154     logger_type  type;
00155     const char * str;
00156 } logtype_strmap[] = {
00157     { logger_type_file,   "file"   },
00158     { logger_type_syslog, "syslog" },
00159     { logger_type_fd,     "fd"     },
00160     { -1,                 NULL     }
00161 };

00169 void
00170 logger_cfg_free(logger_cfg_t * c) {
00171     if (c == NULL) {
00172         return;
00173     }
00174 
00175     if (c->filename) {
00176         free(c->filename);
00177     }
00178     if (c->format) {
00179         free(c->format);
00180     }
00181 
00182     free(c);
00183 }
00184 
00190 logger_cfg_t *
00191 logger_cfg_new(void) {
00192     return calloc(sizeof(logger_cfg_t), 1);
00193 }
00194 
00202 logger_cfg_t *
00203 logger_cfg_parse(cfg_t * cfg) {
00204     logger_cfg_t * lcfg;
00205 
00206     if (cfg == NULL) {
00207         return NULL;
00208     }
00209 
00210     /* if logging is not enabled, don't allocate */
00211     if (cfg_getbool(cfg, "enabled") == cfg_false) {
00212         return NULL;
00213     }
00214 
00215     if (!(lcfg = logger_cfg_new())) {
00216         return NULL;
00217     }
00218 
00219     if (cfg_getstr(cfg, "filename")) {
00220         lcfg->filename = strdup(cfg_getstr(cfg, "filename"));
00221     }
00222 
00223     if (cfg_getstr(cfg, "format")) {
00224         lcfg->format = strdup(cfg_getstr(cfg, "format"));
00225     }
00226 
00227     lcfg->type = logger_type_file;
00228 
00229     if (cfg_getstr(cfg, "type")) {
00230         int i;
00231 
00232         /* match the type value string to a logger_type enum */
00233         for (i = 0; logtype_strmap[i].str; i++) {
00234             if (!strcasecmp(logtype_strmap[i].str, cfg_getstr(cfg, "type"))) {
00235                 lcfg->type = logtype_strmap[i].type;
00236                 break;
00237             }
00238         }
00239     }
00240 
00241     if (cfg_getstr(cfg, "facility")) {
00242         int i;
00243 
00244         /* match the syslog facility value string to the integer var */
00245         for (i = 0; facility_strmap[i].str; i++) {
00246             if (!strcasecmp(facility_strmap[i].str, cfg_getstr(cfg, "facility"))) {
00247                 lcfg->syslog_facility = facility_strmap[i].facility;
00248                 break;
00249             }
00250         }
00251     }
00252 
00253     if (cfg_getstr(cfg, "errorlog")) {
00254         lcfg->errorlog = strdup(cfg_getstr(cfg, "errorlog"));
00255     }
00256 
00257     return lcfg;
00258 } /* logger_cfg_parse */
00259 
00265 void
00266 ssl_cfg_free(evhtp_ssl_cfg_t * c) {
00267     if (c == NULL) {
00268         return;
00269     }
00270 
00271     if (c->pemfile) {
00272         free(c->pemfile);
00273     }
00274     if (c->privfile) {
00275         free(c->privfile);
00276     }
00277     if (c->cafile) {
00278         free(c->cafile);
00279     }
00280     if (c->capath) {
00281         free(c->capath);
00282     }
00283     if (c->ciphers) {
00284         free(c->ciphers);
00285     }
00286 
00287     free(c);
00288 }

00295 evhtp_ssl_cfg_t *
00296 ssl_cfg_new(void) {
00297     return calloc(sizeof(evhtp_ssl_cfg_t), 1);
00298 }
00299 
00307 evhtp_ssl_cfg_t *
00308 ssl_cfg_parse(cfg_t * cfg) {
00309     evhtp_ssl_cfg_t * scfg;
00310     long              ssl_opts        = SSL_OP_NO_SSLv2 | SSL_OP_NO_SSLv3 | SSL_OP_NO_TLSv1;
00311     int               ssl_verify_mode = 0;
00312     int               proto_on_count;
00313     int               proto_off_count;
00314     int               i;
00315 
00316     if (cfg == NULL) {
00317         return NULL;
00318     }
00319 
00320     if (cfg_getbool(cfg, "enabled") == cfg_false) {
00321         return NULL;
00322     }
00323 
00324     if (!(scfg = ssl_cfg_new())) {
00325         return NULL;
00326     }
00327 
00328     if (cfg_getstr(cfg, "cert")) {
00329         scfg->pemfile = strdup(cfg_getstr(cfg, "cert"));
00330     }
00331 
00332     if (cfg_getstr(cfg, "key")) {
00333         scfg->privfile = strdup(cfg_getstr(cfg, "key"));
00334     }
00335 
00336     if (cfg_getstr(cfg, "ca")) {
00337         scfg->cafile = strdup(cfg_getstr(cfg, "ca"));
00338     }
00339 
00340     if (cfg_getstr(cfg, "capath")) {
00341         scfg->capath = strdup(cfg_getstr(cfg, "capath"));
00342     }
00343 
00344     if (cfg_getstr(cfg, "ciphers")) {
00345         scfg->ciphers = strdup(cfg_getstr(cfg, "ciphers"));
00346     }
00347 
00348     if (cfg_getbool(cfg, "verify-peer") == cfg_true) {
00349         ssl_verify_mode |= SSL_VERIFY_PEER;
00350     }
00351 
00352     if (cfg_getbool(cfg, "enforce-peer-cert") == cfg_true) {
00353         ssl_verify_mode |= SSL_VERIFY_FAIL_IF_NO_PEER_CERT;
00354     }
00355 
00356     if (ssl_verify_mode != 0) {
00357         scfg->verify_peer        = ssl_verify_mode;
00358         scfg->verify_depth       = cfg_getint(cfg, "verify-depth");
00359         scfg->x509_verify_cb     = ssl_x509_verifyfn;
00360         scfg->x509_chk_issued_cb = NULL;
00361     }
00362 
00363     if (cfg_getbool(cfg, "cache-enabled") == cfg_true) {
00364         scfg->scache_type    = evhtp_ssl_scache_type_internal;
00365         scfg->scache_size    = cfg_getint(cfg, "cache-size");
00366         scfg->scache_timeout = cfg_getint(cfg, "cache-timeout");
00367     }
00368 
00369     proto_on_count  = cfg_size(cfg, "protocols-on");
00370     proto_off_count = cfg_size(cfg, "protocols-off");
00371 
00372     for (i = 0; i < proto_on_count; i++) {
00373         const char * proto_str = cfg_getnstr(cfg, "protocols-on", i);
00374 
00375         if (!strcasecmp(proto_str, "SSLv2")) {
00376             ssl_opts &= ~SSL_OP_NO_SSLv2;
00377         } else if (!strcasecmp(proto_str, "SSLv3")) {
00378             ssl_opts &= ~SSL_OP_NO_SSLv3;
00379         } else if (!strcasecmp(proto_str, "TLSv1")) {
00380             ssl_opts &= ~SSL_OP_NO_TLSv1;
00381         } else if (!strcasecmp(proto_str, "ALL")) {
00382             ssl_opts = 0;
00383         }
00384     }
00385 
00386     for (i = 0; i < proto_off_count; i++) {
00387         const char * proto_str = cfg_getnstr(cfg, "protocols-off", i);
00388 
00389         if (!strcasecmp(proto_str, "SSLv2")) {
00390             ssl_opts |= SSL_OP_NO_SSLv2;
00391         } else if (!strcasecmp(proto_str, "SSLv3")) {
00392             ssl_opts |= SSL_OP_NO_SSLv3;
00393         } else if (!strcasecmp(proto_str, "TLSv1")) {
00394             ssl_opts |= SSL_OP_NO_TLSv1;
00395         } else if (!strcasecmp(proto_str, "ALL")) {
00396             ssl_opts = SSL_OP_NO_SSLv2 | SSL_OP_NO_SSLv3 | SSL_OP_NO_TLSv1;
00397         }
00398     }
00399 
00400     scfg->ssl_ctx_timeout = cfg_getint(cfg, "context-timeout");
00401     scfg->ssl_opts        = ssl_opts;
00402 
00403     return scfg;
00404 } /* ssl_cfg_parse */

00406 void
00407 downstream_cfg_free(downstream_cfg_t * c) {
00408     if (c == NULL) {
00409         return;
00410     }
00411 
00412     if (c->host) {
00413         free(c->host);
00414     }
00415 
00416     free(c);
00417 }

00419 downstream_cfg_t *
00420 downstream_cfg_new(void) {
00421     return calloc(sizeof(downstream_cfg_t), 1);
00422 }
00423 
00424 downstream_cfg_t *
00425 downstream_cfg_parse(cfg_t * cfg) {
00426     downstream_cfg_t * dscfg;
00427 
00428     if (cfg == NULL) {
00429         return NULL;
00430     }
00431 
00432     if (!(dscfg = downstream_cfg_new())) {
00433         return NULL;
00434     }
00435 
00436     if (cfg_getstr(cfg, "addr")) {
00437         dscfg->host = strdup(cfg_getstr(cfg, "addr"));
00438     }
00439 
00440     dscfg->port           = cfg_getint(cfg, "port");
00441     dscfg->connections    = cfg_getint(cfg, "connections");
00442     dscfg->high_watermark = cfg_getint(cfg, "high-watermark");
00443     dscfg->read_timeout   = cfg_getint(cfg, "read-timeout");
00444     dscfg->write_timeout  = cfg_getint(cfg, "write-timeout");
00445 
00446     if (cfg_getsec(cfg, "retry")) {
00447         cfg_t * rcfg = cfg_getsec(cfg, "retry");
00448 
00449         dscfg->retry_ival.tv_sec  = cfg_getint(rcfg, "seconds");
00450         dscfg->retry_ival.tv_usec = cfg_getint(rcfg, "useconds");
00451     }
00452 
00453     return dscfg;
00454 } /* downstream_cfg_parse */

00456 void
00457 rewrite_cfg_free(rewrite_cfg_t * c) {
00458     if (c == NULL) {
00459         return;
00460     }
00461 
00462     if (c->src) {
00463         free(c->src);
00464     }
00465     if (c->dst) {
00466         free(c->dst);
00467     }
00468 
00469     free(c);
00470 }

00477 rewrite_cfg_t *
00478 rewrite_cfg_parse(cfg_t * cfg) {

00480 
00481     if (cfg == NULL) {
00482         return NULL;
00483     }
00484 
00485     if (!(rwcfg = rewrite_cfg_new())) {
00486         return NULL;
00487     }
00488 
00489     if (cfg_getstr(cfg, "src")) {
00490         rwcfg->src = strdup(cfg_getstr(cfg, "src"));
00491     }
00492 
00493     if (cfg_getstr(cfg, "dst")) {
00494         rwcfg->dst = strdup(cfg_getstr(cfg, "dst"));
00495     }
00496 
00497     return rwcfg;
00498 }

00544 void
00545 headers_cfg_free(headers_cfg_t * c) {
00546     x509_ext_cfg_t * xe;
00547     x509_ext_cfg_t * xe_save;
00548 
00549     if (c == NULL) {
00550         return;
00551     }
00552 
00553     for (xe = TAILQ_FIRST(&c->x509_exts); xe; xe = xe_save) {
00554         xe_save = TAILQ_NEXT(xe, next);
00555 
00556         x509_ext_cfg_free(xe);
00557     }
00558 
00559     free(c);
00560 }
00561 
00562 headers_cfg_t *
00563 headers_cfg_new(void) {
00564     headers_cfg_t * c;
00565 
00566     if (!(c = calloc(sizeof(headers_cfg_t), 1))) {
00567         return NULL;
00568     }
00569 
00570     c->x_forwarded_for   = false;
00571     c->x_ssl_subject     = false;
00572     c->x_ssl_issuer      = false;
00573     c->x_ssl_notbefore   = false;
00574     c->x_ssl_notafter    = false;
00575     c->x_ssl_cipher      = false;
00576     c->x_ssl_certificate = false;
00577 
00578     TAILQ_INIT(&c->x509_exts);
00579 
00580     return c;
00581 }
00582 
00583 headers_cfg_t *
00584 headers_cfg_parse(cfg_t * cfg) {
00585     headers_cfg_t * hcfg;
00586     int             n_x509_exts;
00587     int             i;
00588 
00589     if (cfg == NULL) {
00590         return NULL;
00591     }
00592 
00593     if (!(hcfg = headers_cfg_new())) {
00594         return NULL;
00595     }
00596 
00597     hcfg->x_forwarded_for   = cfg_getbool(cfg, "x-forwarded-for");
00598     hcfg->x_ssl_subject     = cfg_getbool(cfg, "x-ssl-subject");
00599     hcfg->x_ssl_issuer      = cfg_getbool(cfg, "x-ssl-issuer");
00600     hcfg->x_ssl_notbefore   = cfg_getbool(cfg, "x-ssl-notbefore");
00601     hcfg->x_ssl_notafter    = cfg_getbool(cfg, "x-ssl-notafter");
00602     hcfg->x_ssl_serial      = cfg_getbool(cfg, "x-ssl-serial");
00603     hcfg->x_ssl_cipher      = cfg_getbool(cfg, "x-ssl-cipher");
00604     hcfg->x_ssl_certificate = cfg_getbool(cfg, "x-ssl-certificate");
00605 
00606     n_x509_exts = cfg_size(cfg, "x509-extension");
00607     for (i = 0; i < n_x509_exts; i++) {
00608         x509_ext_cfg_t * x509cfg;
00609 
00610         if (!(x509cfg = x509_ext_cfg_parse(cfg_getnsec(cfg, "x509-extension", i)))) {
00611             continue;
00612         }
00613 
00614         TAILQ_INSERT_TAIL(&hcfg->x509_exts, x509cfg, next);
00615     }
00616 
00617     return hcfg;
00618 }
00619 
00620 void
00621 server_cfg_free(server_cfg_t * c) {
00622     downstream_cfg_t * ds;
00623     downstream_cfg_t * ds_save;
00624     rewrite_cfg_t    * rw;
00625     rewrite_cfg_t    * rw_save;
00626 
00627     if (c == NULL) {
00628         return;
00629     }
00630 
00631     if (c->bind_addr) {
00632         free(c->bind_addr);
00633     }
00634     if (c->ssl) {
00635         free(c->ssl);
00636     }
00637     if (c->headers) {
00638         headers_cfg_free(c->headers);
00639     }
00640 
00641     for (ds = TAILQ_FIRST(&c->downstreams); ds; ds = ds_save) {
00642         ds_save = TAILQ_NEXT(ds, next);
00643 
00644         downstream_cfg_free(ds);
00645     }
00646 
00647     for (rw = TAILQ_FIRST(&c->rewrites); rw; rw = rw_save) {
00648         rw_save = TAILQ_NEXT(rw, next);
00649 
00650         rewrite_cfg_free(rw);
00651     }
00652 
00653     free(c);
00654 }
00655 
00656 server_cfg_t *
00657 server_cfg_new(void) {
00658     server_cfg_t * cfg;
00659 
00660     if (!(cfg = calloc(sizeof(server_cfg_t), 1))) {
00661         return NULL;
00662     }
00663 
00664     TAILQ_INIT(&cfg->downstreams);
00665     TAILQ_INIT(&cfg->rewrites);
00666 
00667     return cfg;
00668 }
00669 
00677 static lb_method
00678 _lbstr_to_lbtype(const char * lbstr) {
00679     if (!lbstr) {
00680         return lb_method_rtt;
00681     }
00682 
00683     if (!strcasecmp(lbstr, "rtt")) {
00684         return lb_method_rtt;
00685     }
00686 
00687     if (!strcasecmp(lbstr, "roundrobin")) {
00688         return lb_method_rr;
00689     }
00690 
00691     if (!strcasecmp(lbstr, "random")) {
00692         return lb_method_rand;
00693     }
00694 
00695     if (!strcasecmp(lbstr, "most-idle")) {
00696         return lb_method_most_idle;
00697     }
00698 
00699     if (!strcasecmp(lbstr, "none")) {
00700         return lb_method_none;
00701     }
00702 
00703     return lb_method_rtt;
00704 }
00705 
00706 server_cfg_t *
00707 server_cfg_parse(cfg_t * cfg) {
00708     server_cfg_t * scfg;
00709     int            n_downstreams;
00710     int            n_rewrites;
00711     int            i;
00712 
00713     if (cfg == NULL) {
00714         return NULL;
00715     }
00716 
00717     if (!(scfg = server_cfg_new())) {
00718         return NULL;
00719     }
00720 
00721     scfg->num_threads     = cfg_getint(cfg, "threads");
00722     scfg->bind_addr       = strdup(cfg_getstr(cfg, "addr"));
00723     scfg->bind_port       = cfg_getint(cfg, "port");
00724     scfg->read_timeout    = cfg_getint(cfg, "read-timeout");
00725     scfg->write_timeout   = cfg_getint(cfg, "write-timeout");
00726     scfg->pending_timeout = cfg_getint(cfg, "pending-timeout");
00727     scfg->backlog         = cfg_getint(cfg, "backlog");
00728     scfg->max_pending     = cfg_getint(cfg, "max-pending");
00729     scfg->lbalance_method = _lbstr_to_lbtype(cfg_getstr(cfg, "lb-method"));
00730 
00731     scfg->ssl = ssl_cfg_parse(cfg_getsec(cfg, "ssl"));
00732     scfg->headers         = headers_cfg_parse(cfg_getsec(cfg, "headers"));
00733     scfg->logger          = logger_cfg_parse(cfg_getsec(cfg, "logging"));
00734 
00735     n_downstreams         = cfg_size(cfg, "downstream");
00736     n_rewrites = cfg_size(cfg, "rewrite");
00737 
00738     for (i = 0; i < n_downstreams; i++) {
00739         downstream_cfg_t * dscfg;
00740 
00741         if (!(dscfg = downstream_cfg_parse(cfg_getnsec(cfg, "downstream", i)))) {
00742             continue;
00743         }
00744 
00745         TAILQ_INSERT_TAIL(&scfg->downstreams, dscfg, next);
00746     }
00747 
00748     for (i = 0; i < n_rewrites; i++) {
00749         rewrite_cfg_t * rwcfg;
00750 
00751         if (!(rwcfg = rewrite_cfg_parse(cfg_getnsec(cfg, "rewrite", i)))) {
00752             continue;
00753         }
00754 
00755         TAILQ_INSERT_TAIL(&scfg->rewrites, rwcfg, next);
00756     }
00757 
00758     return scfg;
00759 } /* server_cfg_parse */
00760 
00761 void
00762 rproxy_cfg_free(rproxy_cfg_t * cfg) {
00763     server_cfg_t * server;
00764     server_cfg_t * save;
00765 
00766     if (cfg == NULL) {
00767         return;
00768     }
00769 
00770     if (cfg->user) {
00771         free(cfg->user);
00772     }
00773     if (cfg->group) {
00774         free(cfg->group);
00775     }
00776 
00777     if (cfg->rootdir) {
00778         free(cfg->rootdir);
00779     }
00780 
00781     for (server = TAILQ_FIRST(&cfg->servers); server; server = save) {
00782         save = TAILQ_NEXT(server, next);
00783 
00784         server_cfg_free(server);
00785     }
00786 
00787     free(cfg);
00788 }
00789 
00790 rproxy_cfg_t *
00791 rproxy_cfg_new(void) {
00792     rproxy_cfg_t * cfg;
00793 
00794     if (!(cfg = calloc(sizeof(rproxy_cfg_t), 1))) {
00795         return NULL;
00796     }
00797 
00798     TAILQ_INIT(&cfg->servers);
00799 
00800     return cfg;
00801 }
00802 
00803 rproxy_cfg_t *
00804 rproxy_cfg_parse(cfg_t * cfg) {
00805     rproxy_cfg_t * rpcfg;
00806     int            n_servers;
00807     int            i;
00808 
00809     if (cfg == NULL) {
00810         return NULL;
00811     }
00812 
00813     if (!(rpcfg = rproxy_cfg_new())) {
00814         return NULL;
00815     }
00816 
00817     if (cfg_getstr(cfg, "user")) {
00818         rpcfg->user = strdup(cfg_getstr(cfg, "user"));
00819     }
00820 
00821     if (cfg_getstr(cfg, "group")) {
00822         rpcfg->group = strdup(cfg_getstr(cfg, "group"));
00823     }
00824 
00825     rpcfg->mem_trimsz = cfg_getint(cfg, "memtrim-sz");
00826     rpcfg->max_nofile = cfg_getint(cfg, "max-nofile");
00827     rpcfg->daemonize  = cfg_getbool(cfg, "daemonize");
00828     rpcfg->rootdir    = strdup(cfg_getstr(cfg, "rootdir"));
00829 
00830     n_servers         = cfg_size(cfg, "server");
00831 
00832     for (i = 0; i < n_servers; i++) {
00833         server_cfg_t * scfg;
00834 
00835         if (!(scfg = server_cfg_parse(cfg_getnsec(cfg, "server", i)))) {
00836             continue;
00837         }
00838 
00839         TAILQ_INSERT_TAIL(&rpcfg->servers, scfg, next);
00840     }
00841 
00842     return rpcfg;
00843 }
00844 
00845 rproxy_cfg_t *
00846 rproxy_cfg_parse_file(const char * file) {
00847     rproxy_cfg_t * rpcfg;
00848     cfg_t        * cfg;
00849 
00850     if (file == NULL) {
00851         return NULL;
00852     }
00853 
00854     if (!(cfg = cfg_init(rproxy_opts, CFGF_NOCASE))) {
00855         return NULL;
00856     }
00857 
00858     if (cfg_parse(cfg, file) != 0) {
00859         return NULL;
00860     }
00861 
00862     rpcfg = rproxy_cfg_parse(cfg);
00863     cfg_free(cfg);
00864 
00865     return rpcfg;
00866 }
